title: "internal compiler error" during cargo doc

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
I ran `cargo doc --open` for the `ggez` crate and got an internal compiler error.

Output looks like this:
```
$ cargo doc --open
 Documenting unicode-xid v0.1.0

error: build failed
```
